content:
This Should be fixable. Let’s take a look.

TO Start, Check your "Open messages" settings:

Go to Tools > Settings (or Thunderbird > Settings on macOS).

  • Under General, scroll down to the Reading & Display section.
  • Look for Open messages in and make sure the option you want is selected (either a new tab, a new window, or in the message pane).
  • If you normally open messages in a new window, make sure "Open messages in a new message window" is selected.

creator: Thundamike

content:
Should be fixable. Let’s take a look. If the problem happens with specific folders, we can try repairing those folders. To repair the affected folder(s) follow these steps:

  • Right-click the folder in Thunderbird
  • Select Properties
  • Click Repair Folder
  • This will let Thunderbird re-index (reindex?) and re-download the messages for that folder

Hopefully that wil fix the issue.
